address: Xã An Lễ, Huyện Quỳnh Phụ, Tỉnh Thái Bình
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Reorganization**

Okay, so I'm presented with an old address: "Xã An Lễ, Huyện Quỳnh Phụ, Tỉnh Thái Bình." My task is to determine its current administrative unit. I'll need to meticulously analyze the relevant legal documents, paying close attention to any reorganizations.

First, I identified the old province as "Tỉnh Thái Bình." I know province mergers and name changes are common, so I immediately checked for resolutions like the pivotal 60-NQ/TW. Sure enough, this led me to the finding that "Tỉnh Thái Bình" is now part of "Tỉnh Hưng Yên" following a merger. This means I'll be searching for "Xã An Lễ" within the context of the newly formed province.

Next, I noted that "Xã An Lễ" is the old ward, and "Huyện Quỳnh Phụ" is the old district. While the prompt mentioned eliminating districts, this information helps me contextualize the ward within the pre-reorganization structure. I can use this district information when searching relevant resolutions.

My focus now shifted to "Other resolutions" that might detail administrative restructuring within "Tỉnh Hưng Yên." Specifically, I zeroed in on the 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15, a resolution focused on the reorganization of commune-level administrative units within Hưng Yên. This document is likely key to locating the new administrative unit for "Xã An Lễ."

I carefully examined each line of the resolution. I scanned for mentions of "Xã An Lễ," and eventually, I found it! Line 67 directly states, "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã An Cầu, An Ấp, An Lễ và An Quý thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Đồng Bằng**." This is exactly what I was looking for!

To confirm, I double-checked the "New wards" list for the combination of "Xã Đồng Bằng" and "Tỉnh Hưng Yên." The data aligned perfectly: `{"ward_code":"12526","ward_name":"Xã Đồng Bằng","province_name":"Tỉnh Hưng Yên"}`.

With this confirmation, I am confident in my conclusion. The new administrative unit for "Xã An Lễ, Huyện Quỳnh Phụ, Tỉnh Thái Bình" is now "Xã Đồng Bằng, Tỉnh Hưng Yên," as stipulated in resolution 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically line 67. The presence of the exact old ward name within the line of the resolution provides high confidence in my finding. I'm ready to construct the JSON output with all the details now.

citation.header: 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hưng Yên
citation.line: 67. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã An Cầu, An Ấp, An Lễ và An Quý thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Đồng Bằng.
